verses.text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْوَشَّاءِ عَنْ أَبَانِ بْنِ عُثْمَانَ عَنْ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ بْنِ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ شَرِبَ مُسْكِراً انْحَبَسَتْ صَلَاتُهُ أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً وَ إِنْ مَاتَ فِي الْأَرْبَعِينَ مَاتَ مِيتَةً جَاهِلِيَّةً فَإِنْ تَابَ تَابَ اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ عَلَيْهِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Al Husayn Bin Muhammad, form Moala Bin Muhammad, from Al Washa, from Aban Bin Usman, from Abdul Rahman Bin Abu Abdullah, 
Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> has said: ‘The one who drinks an intoxicant dirties his Prayer for forty days, and if he were to die during the forty (days) would have died the death of the Pre-Islamic period. But if he were to repent, Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic would Turn towards him’.

verses.text: أَبُو عَلِيٍّ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ الْكُوفِيِّ عَنِ الْعَبَّاسِ بْنِ عَامِرٍ عَنْ دَاوُدَ بْنِ الْحُصَيْنِ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ شَرِبَ مُسْكِراً لَمْ تُقْبَلْ مِنْهُ صَلَاتُهُ أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً فَإِنْ مَاتَ فِي الْأَرْبَعِينَ مَاتَ مِيتَةً جَاهِلِيَّةً وَ إِنْ تَابَ تَابَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Abu Ali Al Ashary, from Al Hassan Bin Ali Al Kufy, from Al Abbas Bin Aamir, from Dawood Bin Al Husayn, 
Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> has said: ‘The one who drinks an intoxicant, his Prayer would not be Accepted from him for forty days. So if he were to die during the forty (days), would have died a death of the Pre-Islamic period; however if he were to repent, Allah<sup>azwj</sup> would Turn towards him’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ مِهْرَانَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ رَجُلٍ عَنْ سَعْدٍ الْإِسْكَافِ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ شَرِبَ مُسْكِراً لَمْ تُقْبَلْ مِنْهُ صَلَاتُهُ أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً وَ إِنْ عَادَ سَقَاهُ اللَّهُ مِنْ طِينَةِ خَبَالٍ قَالَ قُلْتُ وَ مَا طِينَةُ خَبَالٍ فَقَالَ مَاءٌ يَخْرُجُ مِنْ فُرُوجِ الزُّنَاةِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Mihran Bin Muhammad, from a man, from Sa’ad Al Iskaf, (It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’farasws having said: ‘The one who drinks an intoxicant, his Prayer would not be Accepted from him for forty days; and if he were to repeat, Allahazwj would Quench him from an essence of Khabaal’. He (the narrator) said, ‘I said, ‘And what is an essence of Khabaal?’ So heasws said: ‘Water which comes out from the private part of the adulteress’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ بْنِ الْحَجَّاجِ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ شَرِبَ الْخَمْرَ لَمْ يَقْبَلِ اللَّهُ لَهُ صَلَاةً أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Abdul Rahman Bin Al Hajjaj, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who drinks the wine, his Prayer would not be Accepted from him for forty days’.

verses.text: أَبُو عَلِيٍّ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْجَبَّارِ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ عَنِ الْعَلَاءِ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مُسْلِمٍ عَنْ أَحَدِهِمَا ( عليهما السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ شَرِبَ مِنَ الْخَمْرِ شَرْبَةً لَمْ يَقْبَلِ اللَّهُ مِنْهُ صَلَاةً أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Abu Ali Al Ashary, from Muhammad Bin Abdul Jabbar, from Safwan, from Al A’ala, from Muhammad Bin Muslim, 
(It has been narrated) from one of the two (5th or 6th Imam<sup>asws</sup>) having said: ‘The one who drinks from the wine a drink, a Prayer would not be Accepted from him for forty days’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحَكَمِ عَنْ سَيْفِ بْنِ عَمِيرَةَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مَرْوَانَ عَنِ الْفُضَيْلِ بْنِ يَسَارٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ عِنْدَ فِطْرِ كُلِّ لَيْلَةٍ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ عُتَقَاءَ يُعْتِقُهُمْ مِنَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَنْ أَفْطَرَ عَلَى مُسْكِرٍ وَ مَنْ شَرِبَ مُسْكِراً لَمْ تُحْتَسَبْ لَهُ صَلَاتُهُ أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً فَإِنْ مَاتَ فِيهَا مَاتَ مِيتَةً جَاهِلِيَّةً .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ali Bin Al Hakam, from Sayf Bin Umeyra, from Muhammad Bin Marwan, from Al Fuzayl Bin Yasaar, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic, during the breaking of the Fast in every night from the Month of Ramazan librates enslaved people from the Fire, except for the one who breaks Fast upon an intoxicant, and the one who drinks an intoxication, his Prayer would not be Reckoned for him for forty days, so if he were to die during these, he would have died a death of the Pre-Islamic period’.

verses.text: أَحْمَدُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنِ ابْنِ مُسْكَانَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ عَنْ أَبِي الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ إِنَّهُ لَمَّا احْتُضِرَ أَبِي ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ لِي يَا بُنَيَّ إِنَّهُ لَا يَنَالُ شَفَاعَتَنَا مَنِ اسْتَخَفَّ بِالصَّلَاةِ وَ لَا يَرِدُ عَلَيْنَا الْحَوْضَ مَنْ أَدْمَنَ هَذِهِ الْأَشْرِبَةَ فَقُلْتُ يَا أَبَهْ وَ أَيَّ الْأَشْرِبَةِ فَقَالَ كُلَّ مُسْكِرٍ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Ibn Muskan, from Abu Baseer, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Al-Hassan<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘When my<sup>asws</sup> father<sup>asws</sup> was about to pass away, he<sup>asws</sup> said to me<sup>asws</sup>: ‘O my<sup>asws</sup> son<sup>asws</sup>! He would not attain our<sup>asws</sup> intercession, the one who holds the Prayer in light estimation, nor would he return to us<sup>asws</sup> at the Fountain, the one who is habitual in these drinks’. So I<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘O father<sup>asws</sup>! And which drinks?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Every intoxicant’.

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ عَنْ عُثْمَانَ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ سَمَاعَةَ بْنِ مِهْرَانَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) مَنْ شَرِبَ مِنْكُمْ مُسْكِراً لَمْ تُقْبَلْ مِنْهُ صَلَاتُهُ أَرْبَعِينَ لَيْلَةً .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Khalid, from Usman Bin Isa, from Sama’at Bin Mihran, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> said:’ The one who drinks an intoxication from among you, his Prayer would not be Accepted from him for forty nights’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ حَمَّادِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنِ الْحُسَيْنِ بْنِ الْمُخْتَارِ عَنْ عَمْرِو بْنِ شِمْرٍ قَالَ سَمِعْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ مَنْ شَرِبَ شَرْبَةَ خَمْرٍ لَمْ يَقْبَلِ اللَّهُ مِنْهُ صَلَاتَهُ سَبْعاً وَ مَنْ سَكِرَ لَمْ تُقْبَلْ مِنْهُ صَلَاتُهُ أَرْبَعِينَ صَبَاحاً .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Hammad Bin Isa, from Al Husayn Bin Al Mukhtar, from Amro Bin Shimr who said, 
‘I heard Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> saying: ‘The one who drinks a wine drink, his Prayer would not be Accepted from him for a week, and the one get intoxicated, his Prayer would not be Accepted from him for forty days’.

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ عَنْ عُثْمَانَ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ سَمَاعَةَ بْنِ مِهْرَانَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) مَنْ شَرِبَ خَمْراً حَتَّى يَسْكَرَ لَمْ يَقْبَلِ اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ مِنْهُ صَلَاتَهُ أَرْبَعِينَ صَبَاحاً .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Khalid, from Usman Bin Isa, from Sama’at Bin Mihran, from Abu Baseer, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> said: ‘The one who drinks wine until he is intoxicated, Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic would not Accept his Prayer from him for forty days’.

verses.text: عَلِيٌّ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ النَّضْرِ بْنِ سُوَيْدٍ عَنْ هِشَامِ بْنِ سَالِمٍ عَنْ سُلَيْمَانَ بْنِخَالِدٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ شَرِبَ شَرْبَةً مِنْ خَمْرٍ لَمْ يَقْبَلِ اللَّهُ مِنْهُ صَلَاتَهُ أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali, from his father, from Al Nazar Bin Suweyd, from Hisham Bin Salim, from Suleyman Bin Khalid, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who drinks a drink from wine, his Prayer would not be Accepted from him for forty days’.

verses.text:
مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي نَصْرٍ عَنِ الْحُسَيْنِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ قَالَ قُلْتُ لِأَبِي الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) إِنَّا رُوِّينَا عَنِ النَّبِيِّ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) أَنَّهُ قَالَ مَنْ شَرِبَ الْخَمْرَ لَمْ تُحْتَسَبْ لَهُ صَلَاتُهُ أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً قَالَ فَقَالَ صَدَقُوا قُلْتُ وَ كَيْفَ لَا تُحْتَسَبُ صَلَاتُهُ أَرْبَعِينَ صَبَاحاً لَا أَقَلَّ مِنْ ذَلِكَ وَ لَا أَكْثَرَ فَقَالَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ قَدَّرَ خَلْقَ الْإِنْسَانِ فَصَيَّرَهُ نُطْفَةً أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً ثُمَّ نَقَلَهَا فَصَيَّرَهَا عَلَقَةً أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً ثُمَّ نَقَلَهَا فَصَيَّرَهَا مُضْغَةً أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً فَهُوَ إِذَا شَرِبَ الْخَمْرَ بَقِيَتْ فِي مُشَاشِهِ أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً عَلَى قَدْرِ انْتِقَالِ خِلْقَتِهِ
قَالَ ثُمَّ قَالَ ( عليه السلام ) وَ كَذَلِكَ جَمِيعُ غِذَائِهِ أَكْلِهِ وَ شُرْبِهِ يَبْقَى فِي مُشَاشِهِ أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْماً.

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from Ibn Abu Nasr, from Al Husayn Bin Khalid who said, 
‘I said to Abu Al-Hassan<sup>asws</sup>, ‘We are reporting from the Prophet<sup>saww</sup> that he<sup>saww</sup> said: ‘The one who drinks the wine, his Prayer would not be Counted for him for forty days’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘They speak the truth’. I said, ‘And how come his Prayer would not be counted for forty days, neither less from that, nor more?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic Measured the creation of the human being, so He<sup>azwj</sup> Caused his seed to be such for forty days. Then Transformed it, so it became a clot for forty days. Then Transformed it, so it became a lump for forty days. So he, when he drinks the wine, it remains in his bone joints for forty days upon the measurement of his Creation’. 
He (the narrator) said, ‘Then he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘And similar to that for the entirety of his food intake, and his drinks, they remain in his bone-joints for forty days’.
